Room.Name: Charikawa's House of healing
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a healing place where you see a table with leather straps on it.
Room.LongDescription: On the wall behind the table are a number of surgeon's tools, and a few carpenter's tools. On the wall is a certificate stating that Charikawa graduated from the School of Astrology at Iilandi University in the city of Oceancrest. Charikawa thinks of himself as a surgeon.
